00047 typedef enum WntConcentrationType_
00048 {
00049     NONE,
00050     LINEAR,
00051     RADIAL
00052 } WntConcentrationType;

00058 template<unsigned DIM>
00059 class WntConcentration
00060 {
00061 private:
00062 
00064     static WntConcentration *mpInstance;

00068

00076

00090     double mConstantWntValueForTesting;
00091 
00096     bool mUseConstantWntValueForTesting;
00097 
00099     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00106     template<class Archive>
00107     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00108     {
00109         mpTissueConfig = TissueConfig::Instance();
00110         archive & *mpTissueConfig;
00111         archive & mpTissueConfig;
00112         archive & mWntType;
00113         archive & mpTissue;
00114         archive & mTypeSet;
00115         archive & mConstantWntValueForTesting;
00116         archive & mUseConstantWntValueForTesting;
00117     }
00118

00120

00125

00146

00155

00165

00173 
00181     c_vector<double, DIM> GetWntGradient(TissueCell* pCell);
